title: Bank Layout & Digital Locations

sections.title: Vocabulary: Where is it in the Bank?
sections.content:
To find your way in a bank, use these prepositions:

- **Next to**: The ATM is next to the door.
- **Opposite**: The counter is opposite the entrance.
- **Between**: The manager's office is between the vault and the waiting area.
- **Inside**: Your money is inside the safe.
- **Behind**: The security guard is behind the desk.

sections.title: Bank Branch Layout
sections.content:
```mermaid
graph TD
    A[Entrance] --> B[ATM - Next to Door]
    A --> C[Counter - Opposite Entrance]
    C --> D[Manager Office - Behind Counter]
    C --> E[Waiting Area - Next to Counter]
```

sections.title: Vocabulary: Where is it on the App?
sections.content:
We also use prepositions for apps and websites:

- **At the top**: The 'Log in' button is at the top of the screen.
- **At the bottom**: The 'Contact Us' link is at the bottom.
- **Inside**: Your documents are inside the 'Cloud' (online storage).
- **Under**: The 'Settings' menu is under your profile picture.

sections.title: Grammar: Prepositions of Place
sections.content:
Use 'Where is...?' to ask for locations:

- *Where is the nearest ATM?*
- *Where is the 'Transfer' button on the app?*

Responses:
- *It is **on** the main screen.*
- *It is **next to** the balance.*

objectives: Describe the location of physical objects in a bank office
Identify the position of buttons and menus in a banking app
Use prepositions of place to give and understand directions

keyTerms.definition: In the highest part of a screen or page.
Stored on the internet, not on your physical computer.
On the other side of a space (facing each other).
